docs.snippet: A judge in Los Angeles will decide if Donald Sterling, the embattled owner of the N.B.A.’s Clippers, is mentally competent to serve as a trustee of the family trust....
docs.lead_paragraph: A judge in Los Angeles will decide if Donald Sterling, the embattled owner of the N.B.A.’s Clippers, is mentally competent to serve as a trustee of the family trust.
docs.abstract: Los Angeles Judge Michael Levanas agrees to hold trial to determine whether Donald Sterling is medically capable of serving as trustee of the Sterling family trust, which controls the Los Angeles Clippers; decision will probably have consequences for the team and NBA.

headline.main: Sterling to Face Trial on Mental Capacity
headline.print_headline: Sterling to Face Trial on Capacity to Manage Family Trust

byline.contributor: Noah Gilbert reported from Los Angeles and Scott Cacciola from Miami.
byline.original: By NOAH GILBERT and SCOTT CACCIOLA

docs.snippet: The Nets’ Andray Blatche was granted Philippine citizenship so he can play for the country’s team at the World Cup this year, Philippine officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Nets’ Andray Blatche was granted Philippine citizenship so he can play for the country’s team at the World Cup this year, Philippine officials said.
docs.abstract: Brooklyn Nets player Andray Blatche is granted Philippine citizenship so he can play for the country's team at the World Cup.

docs.snippet: The multinational Spurs are often interviewed by reporters from France, Argentina, Brazil and Italy, but the star on Tuesday was Kawhi Leonard of Riverside, Calif....
docs.lead_paragraph: The multinational Spurs are often interviewed by reporters from France, Argentina, Brazil and Italy, but the star on Tuesday was Kawhi Leonard of Riverside, Calif.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column describes how San Antonio Spurs forward Kawhi Leonard was star of the team after his performance in Game 2 of NBA finals against Miami Heat; notes that the multinational Spurs praised his performance in variety of languages to reporters from around the world.

headline.main: The Spurs Speak Out, in Different Languages
headline.print_headline: The Spurs Speak Out, in Different Languages

docs.snippet: The role of Chip Engelland, a San Antonio assistant, was spotlighted in the team’s offensive fireworks in Game 3 of the N.B.A. finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: The role of Chip Engelland, a San Antonio assistant, was spotlighted in the team’s offensive fireworks in Game 3 of the N.B.A. finals.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs assistant coach Chip Engelland, team's designated shooting guru, has moved into the spotlight after team's 111-92 victory in Game 3 of the NBA finals featured offensive fireworks seldom seen in the playoffs.

headline.main: Spurs Set Records, and Their Shooting Guru Offers Only a Shrug
headline.print_headline: Spurs Set Records, and Shooting Guru Offers Only a Shrug

docs.snippet: Shelly Sterling on Wednesday was granted a trial next month in Los Angeles to resolve a dispute with her estranged husband Donald Sterling over who controls the NBA's Los Angeles Clippers, leaving its $2 billion sale up in the air....
